title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2919/93 of 22 October 1993 fixing for the 1993/94 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2919/93 of 22 October 1993 fixing for the 1993/94 marketing year the reference prices for cabbage lettuce
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1993/94 marketing year, the reference prices for cabbage lettuce (CN codes 0705 11 10 and 90), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of Class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- from 1 November to 31 December 1993: 70,82,
- from 1 January to 28 February 1994: 76,11,
- from 1 March to 31 May 1994: 82,90.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
